summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus Iteration 7 features. All 21 backend tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all new features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (200 OK)
Backend: Counselor login (200 OK)
Backend: Team Lead login (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/targets/counselors - Admin can see all assignable counselors
Backend: GET /api/targets/counselors - Team Lead can see team members
Backend: GET /api/targets/counselors - Regular counselor denied (403)
Backend: POST /api/targets - Admin can create target
Backend: GET /api/targets - Admin can get all targets
Backend: GET /api/targets/progress - Returns targets with progress calculation
Backend: PUT /api/targets/{id} - Admin can update target
Backend: DELETE /api/targets/{id} - Admin can delete target
Backend: Admissions have remark field in admin dashboard
Backend: Counselor admissions have remark field
Backend: Create admission with remark works
Backend: Admin can edit any admission
Backend: Team Lead can edit team member admissions
Backend: Counselor can edit own admission
Backend: Admin can add instalment to any admission
Backend: Admin stats admissions-list returns paginated data with remarks
Backend: Performance stats returns correct structure
Backend: Performance stats by counselor works
Frontend: Admin Performance Dashboard - Targets tab visible and default
Frontend: Admin - Assign Target button works
Frontend: Admin - Target assignment dialog has all fields (counselor, period type, period, count, fees)
Frontend: Admin - Target progress bars show correctly (1/10 admissions = 10%, ₹1,00,000/₹5,00,000 = 20%)
Frontend: Admin - All Admissions tab shows Remarks column
Frontend: Admin - Edit admission buttons visible for all admissions
Frontend: Admin - Edit admission dialog has Add Instalment button
Frontend: Counselor - Admissions page shows Remarks column
Frontend: Counselor - Edit admission dialog has Remarks field and Add Instalment button
Frontend: Counselor - Add New Admission dialog has Remarks field
Frontend: Team Lead - Can access Counselor Portal with Admissions page
seed_data_creation: Database has existing target for Demo Counselor: 10 admissions target, ₹5,00,000 fees target. Current progress: 1 admission (10%), ₹1,00,000 fees (20%). 4 admissions exist with remarks.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Iteration 7 features tested and working: 1) Target Tracking - Admin/Team Lead/Admission Manager can assign admission targets to counselors with progress bars showing admissions count and fees collected progress. Targets can be created, edited, and deleted. 2) Remarks column - Visible in both Counselor Admissions page and Admin Performance Dashboard All Admissions tab. Remarks can be added when creating/editing admissions. 3) Fee Payment Editing - Admin can edit any admission's fee instalments. Team Lead can edit team members' admissions. Counselor can only edit their own admissions. Add Instalment button available in edit dialog. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_iteration7_features.py with 21 comprehensive tests.

details: Admin can assign targets to any counselor
Team Lead can assign targets to team members
Admission Manager can assign targets to any counselor
Regular counselor cannot access target endpoints (403)
Progress bars show admissions count and fees collected
Targets can be created, updated, and deleted
Remarks column visible in Counselor Admissions page
Remarks column visible in Admin Performance Dashboard All Admissions tab
Remarks can be added when creating new admission
Remarks can be edited when updating admission
Admin can edit fee instalments of any admission
Team Lead can edit fee instalments of team members' admissions
Admission Manager can edit fee instalments of any admission
Counselor can only edit their own admissions
Add Instalment button available in edit dialog
